CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY // 6
/ OPEN SIMULATION ECOSYSTEM ACROSS THE ENTIRE PROCUCT LIFECYCLE

Agnostic interoperability to leverage and enhance  
existing engineering processes

Ease-of-use enables more engineers to use simulation

Integrated simulation representing real-world behavior
/ MANUFACTURING
Insights to reduce product manufacturing costs and risks
/ OPERATIONS
Monitor, predict and optimize in-field product 
performance through digital twins
